function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement automated occupancy-based system controls to optimize energy use and reduce unnecessary operation of systems","category":"Shift controls (occupancy control of total users)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct regular energy audits to identify and address energy wastage, and adjust systems to match occupancy levels","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Upgrade to energy-efficient refrigerators and implement regular maintenance and monitoring of refrigeration systems","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote regular health check-ups, increase access to remote health monitoring tools","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish clear referral pathways to specialized covid-19 treatment centers, provide adequate training and resources for covid-19 management","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement energy-efficient facilities and conduct further monitoring and evaluations","category":"Environment parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct further monitoring and evaluations, identify and address waste patterns, implement energy-saving measures","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Investigate and optimize the impact of opa on energy use, implement energy-saving measures based on opa insights","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular monitoring of energy consumption and backup power systems","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investigate the cause of energy increase and implement energy-efficient measures","category":"Environment parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular checks on power supply and backup systems, prompt response to power supply issues","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote
